analytic.title: Samuel Abraham Poznański’s Karaite mission: from Wissenschaft to Jewish nationalism

monogr.title: Modern Jewish scholarship on Islam in context: rationality, European borders, and the search for belonging

biblStruct.note: Samuel Abraham Poznański’s Karaite Mission: From Wissenschaft to Jewish Nationalism was published in Modern Jewish Scholarship on Islam in Context on page 121.

body.bibl: Frenkel, Miriam. “Samuel Abraham Poznański’s Karaite Mission: From Wissenschaft to Jewish Nationalism.” In Modern Jewish Scholarship on Islam in Context: Rationality, European Borders, and the Search for Belonging, edited by Ottfried Fraisse, 121–44. Berlin & Boston: De Gruyter, 2018. https://doi.org/10.1515/9783110446890-008.
